title: Bio-based sunflower carbon/polyethylene glycol shape-stabilized phase change materials for thermal energy storage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24141-24151

Ning Gao, Jiaoli Du, Wenbo Yang, Bocun Sun, Juncheng Li, Tian Xia, Youbing Li, Chaolong Yang, Xiaolin Liu
The exploitation of shape-stabilized phase change materials with high thermal conductivity and energy storage capacity is an effective strategy for improving energy efficiency.
